title: पुराना वीडियो भारत-पाकिस्तान सेना के बीच दिवाली पर मिठाई बांटने के दावे से शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Indian & Pakistani forces exchanged mithai & greetings. How many lapdog channels showed this to the public? How many newspapers had it on the front page? Drum-beating, chest-thumping Mr 56 will sacrifice any number of lives for political gain before 2024.pic.twitter.com/p70GNoIVEC
